features: Proprietary, welded Lamina™ construction enhances loft and eliminates cold spots
Thermal.Q insulation(80% recycled) insulates when wet and reduces impact on the planet
Women’s-specific mummy cut is efficient, warm, and comfortable
Contoured footbox follows natural foot position for maximum warmth and comfort
Tailored hood comfortably blocks drafts and seals in warmth
30D nylon ripstop shell fabric is lightweight and compressible with DWR finish
